home.title: SAN FRANCISCO HOTELS
home.subtitle: We are a company with more than 14 years in the hotel industry.
home.hotel1_desc: The Hotel has 60 cozy rooms, including: Single, Double, Double, Triple, Family and Suit.
home.hotel2_desc: The hotel has 30 cozy rooms, including: Single, Double, Double, Triple, Family and Suit.
home.hotel3_desc: The hotel has 37 cozy rooms, including: Single, Matrimonial, Double, Double, Triple, Family and Suit.
home.conocenos_desc: At present the San Francisco chain comprises 3 hotels within the city of Cusco: San Francisco Plaza and San Francisco Cusco, both 3 star category and our new Hotel San Francisco Inka; the latter of 4 star category. Year after year receives visitors from all over Peru and worldwide, our hotels stand out for their location, 2 of the hotels near the historic center and one near the airport, which makes our guest have the best option. Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
home.mision_desc: To provide a unique experience to all our customers.
home.vision_desc: To be one of the best recognized hotel chains nationwide.
home.valores_desc: Respect, Empathy, Responsibility, Honesty, and Solidarity
home.hoteles_desc: We started with our first Hotel San Francisco Plaza ***, which opened its doors to the public in 2010, aimed at both domestic and foreign travelers. Little by little we grew, being in the year 2017 that we opened the Hotel San Francisco Cusco ***, aimed at corporate clients, business people and also to our foreign visitors seeking modernity and elegance. Currently we present our new Hotel San Francisco Inka **** being the latter of a higher category, near the historic center and other attractions, has a colonial and modern architecture. Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
home.personal_desc: The staff working in our hotel chain, provides a unique and personalized attention to all our guests, from their arrival to their departure, providing all kinds of information, from places of interest, activities and events, ready to help at any time. They also receive constant training to be prepared for any situation, which provides security to our customers and makes your stay even more pleasant.
home.servicios_desc: All our reservations include the following services
home.name: SAN FRANCISCO HOTEL
home.hotel_desc: We are a Peruvian and Cusquenian hotel chain, focused on providing our guests with a different experience full of unforgettable moments.
galeria.title: ENJOY OUR GALLERY
contact.name: Name
footer.title: San Francisco Hoteles
bar_desc: After a good walk, comes a good cocktail.
informacion_desc: We provide you with all the information about tourist destinations.
equipaje_desc: We store and take care of your luggage
restaurant_desc: The best gastronomy in our Restaurant.
despertar_desc: We help you wake up early
inka.title: San Francisco Inka
inka.text: Located in Calle Nueva Alta, near the historic center and other attractions, has a colonial and modern architecture that will surprise you from its entrance, has 3 beautiful courtyards, stone arches, and of course its own elevator, a very spacious and ideal place for all our domestic and foreign guests, groups, families and couples.
inka.subtitle: COLONIAL, MODERN AND GOLD LEAF
inka.name: HOTEL SAN FRANCISCO INKA
inka.desc: The Hotel has 60 cozy rooms, including: Single, Double, Double, Triple, Family and Suit.
inka.conocenos_desc: The rooms that comprise the chain have a modern and elegant finish, each room is equipped with Smart TVs, heating, safe, spacious and comfortable beds, private bathroom, hairdryer, closet, desk, wifi connection among others.
inka.suit_desc: Room with 1 living room plus 1 King bed
inka.familiar_desc: Standard room with 1 Queen bed plus 1 twin bed
inka.simple_desc: Standard Single Room with 1 twin bed
inka.triple_desc: Spacious room with 3 double beds, safety box, heating and private bathroom.
plaza.title: San Francisco Plaza
plaza.text: Hotel San Francisco Plaza *** located on Ceniza Street, which opened its doors to the public in 2010, for both domestic and foreign travelers, in which they enjoy a colonial and modern architecture that impacts from the entrance, and of course accompanied by personalized attention from our staff.
plaza.subtitle: A COLONIAL HOUSE WITH ARCHITECTURE IN CUSCO
plaza.name: SAN FRANCISCO PLAZA HOTEL
plaza.desc: The hotel has 30 cozy rooms that have been conditioned for rest and comfort, among: Single, Double, Double, Triple, Family and Suit.
plaza.conocenos_desc: The rooms that comprise the chain have a modern and elegant finish, each room is equipped with Smart TVs, heating, safe, spacious and comfortable beds, private bathroom, hairdryer, closet, desk, wifi connection among others.
plaza.familiar_desc: Standard room with 1 Queen bed plus 1 twin bed
plaza.simple_desc: Standard Single Room with 1 twin bed
cusco.title: San Francisco Cusco
cusco.text: Hotel San Francisco Cusco ***, located in Av. Tupac Amaru, for corporate clients, business people who enjoy the proximity to the airport and a quiet location to rest after a busy day, also enjoyed by our foreign visitors seeking modernity and elegance. The Hotel has a beautiful view of the surrounding city and of course has its own garage.
cusco.subtitle: MODERNITY AND ELEGANCE
cusco.name: HOTEL SAN FRANCISCO CUSCO
cusco.desc: The hotel has 37 cozy rooms, including: Single, Matrimonial, Double, Double, Triple, Family and Suit.
cusco.conocenos_desc: Year after year we receive a large number of guests, people of different nationalities who have been part of our hotel and services, of which many of them have taken great memories of comfort, attention and warmth; this hand in hand with our employees, who every day give the best of them to make the experience more than a memory.
cusco.familiar_desc: Standard room with 1 Queen bed plus 1 twin bed
cusco.simple_desc: Standard Single Room with 1 twin bed
habitaciones.title: Hotel Suizo
habitaciones.subtitle: Hotel Peruano Suiza cuenta con 16 habitaciones entre Estandars y Superiores
habitaciones.matrimonialph1: Lindas habitaciones con 1 cama de 2 plazas
habitaciones.matrimonialdesc: Lindas habitaciones con 1 cama de 2 plazas, tv de 32”, Calefacción, Escritorio, Silla, Wi Fi gratis, Jabón, Shampoo, Juego de toallas
habitaciones.dobledesc: Lindas habitaciones con 2 camas de 1.5 plazas, tv de 32”, Calefacción, Escritorio, Silla, Wi Fi gratis, Jabón, Shampoo, Juego de toallas
habitaciones.dobleph1: Lindas habitaciones con 2 camas de 1.5 plazas
habitaciones.estandardesc: Lindas habitaciones con 1 cama de 2 plazas, tv de 32”, Calefacción, Escritorio, Silla, Wi Fi gratis, Jabón, Shampoo, Juego de toallas.
habitaciones.estandarph1: Lindas habitaciones con 1 cama de 2 plazas
habitaciones.tripledesc: Lindas habitaciones con 3 camas de 1.5 plazas, Tv de 32” con DirecTV, Calefacción, Escritorio, Silla, Wi Fi gratis, Jabón, Shampoo, Juego de toallas
habitaciones.tripleph1: Lindas habitaciones con 3 camas de 1.5 plazas
habitaciones.hotel: Estamos ubicados en la ciudadela de Aguas Calientes a sólo 30 minutos del magnífico Santuario Histórico de Machu Picchu. Hoteles Peruano Suiza busca sumergirle en la experiencia excepcional de Suiza con la esencia de Perú, nuestro equipo de amables colaboradores podrá ofrecerle una gama de servicios diseñados para que su estadía sea lo más placentera posible, estamos seguros que disfrutará de una experiencia de primer nivel.
aboutus.title: SOBRE NOSOTROS
aboutus.titledesc: Somos un hotel elegante y confortable, con la modernidad y naturaleza que nuestros huéspedes requieren. Nuestro número de habitaciones, nos permite brindar una atención familiar y altamente personalizada, nos esforzamos día a día, para proporcionarles todo el servicio y confort que se merecen, que hace de nuestro hotel su mejor experiencia de viaje.
aboutus.calides_amabilidad_desc: Ofrecemos un trato cuidadoso y amable, entregando nuestra mejor actitud para hacer sentir a nuestros visitantes bienvenidos y apreciados
aboutus.compromiso_puntulidad_desc: Somos conscientes de lo importante que es cumplir con cada una de nuestras funciones y el servicio a nuestros huéspedes. Todo lo que necesita lo tendrá a tiempo
aboutus.excelencia_calidad_desc: Con un servicio de calidad y pequeños detalles superamos las expectativas de nuestros visitantes, más que su satisfacción, queremos su fidelidad.
aboutus.comunicacion_desc: Adaptación al cambio: Practicamos una comunicación inclusiva, oportuna y sin prejuicios que nos permite ver el cambio como una oportunidad de desarrollo.
aboutus.resena_historica_desc: Donde otros ven dificultades, nosotros vemos oportunidades. En medio de una crisis sanitaria, Jorge y José Gabriel, apasionados por brindar una atención de excelencia, decidieron emprender un nuevo proyecto dentro del rubro hotelero y con el objetivo de sumergir a los visitantes en una experiencia excepcional de Suiza con la esencia de Perú, nace en Machu Picchu “Hoteles Peruano Suiza” permitiéndole al huésped vivir la más cálida bienvenida y una experiencia excepcional durante su estancia.
aboutus.mision_desc: Somos una empresa familiar que fusiona el estilo de vida en Suiza y la calidez peruana para brindar a nuestros visitantes una experiencia excepcional.
aboutus.vision_desc: Ser en Machu Picchu el mejor lugar para trabajar, dónde nuestros visitantes logren descansar, relajarse y permanecer con una sonrisa durante toda su estancia.
galeria.subtitle: DESCUBRE CUSCO Y SUS MISTERIOS
galeria.text1: Luego regresa y descansa con nosotros...
galeria.title2: CUSCO, MAGIA Y MISTERIO TE ESPERA...
galeria.card_title_1: Welcome to Cusco, let us know about you...
galeria.card_title_2: We Would like you to feel like home, you are important for Us.
